entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
